content: {"locationId": "7252", "organizationId": "6166", "name": "Hebron Community Food Pantry", "address1": "10206 Seaman Road", "address2": null, "city": "Hebron", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "60034", "country": null, "phone": "815-790-7267", "phoneExt": null, "website": null, "latitude": "42.474226", "longitude": "-88.4172886", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The  Food Pantry is   available to only those who live in School District #19.  Our clients may shop once a month.  We are open the 1st and 3rd Thursday of each month.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Bobette Von Bergen", "contactPhone": "815-790-7267", "contactEmail": "vbacres@hotmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 3, "regionName": "Vivery Network", "logoBlobNameSmall": "9d6f806b-b144-4a23-97ab-62ef7377b68d.png", "website": "http://www.vivery.org"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
